title: Limited Flexibility in terms of Bank accounts
body: The main idea to invest in US stocks is to move a portion of your assets in another jurisdiction to avoid rupee depreciation and diversify the risk of holding all the assets in one country (India). This app does not allow the option to transfer money in to a foreign bank account once you sell your shares. This means that once you sell you need to convert back to Indian rupees and then again transfer back to USD to move the money to a foreign account. On a large portfolio this is lot of money lost in commision and conversion and the whole idea of keeping the money abroad is gone. You can rather use other US brokerage apps to buy these US shares who provide all the flexibility of adding any bank account and while selling there is no loss in conversion and commissions. This makes IND Money super market expensive in the longer term unless they give you option to add foreign bank accounts.

title: Powerful Features, Yet a Buggy iOS Experience
body:
I really appreciate the flexibility INDmoney offers and the thoughtful, investor-friendly features‚Äîespecially small but impactful touches like setting price alerts when a stock drops below a certain percentage, and timely prompts when multiple actionable options appear exactly when you need them.

That said, I sincerely hope the team prioritizes a complete overhaul of the iOS app experience. The app feels quite buggy and glitchy during regular use. For example, after successfully funding the US wallet, the app doesn‚Äôt automatically redirect back to the orders page and instead gets stuck on the same screen. Page transitions are not seamless, and navigation often feels clunky. Additionally, some menus and options are not visually aligned properly, which affects the overall user experience.

Given that apps like Groww and CRED offer a much smoother and more stable iOS experience, I strongly urge the developers to focus more on optimizing and refining the iOS app. INDmoney has excellent features and potential‚Äîpolishing the app‚Äôs performance would truly elevate it to the next level.
